text:
 MCV < 80um3 suggests iron deficiency anaemia (microcytic)
 MCV (80-100um3) suggests anaemia of chronic disease (normocytic)
 MCV (>100um3 suggests folate or vitamin B12 deficiency anaemia (macrocytic)
o If the FBC shows a microcytic picture, it is reasonable to initially treat as iron-deficiency anaemia
o if the FBC shows a normocytic or macrocytic picture, do further tests:
 iron studies, red cell folate and vitamin B12 levels to identify the cause
